$(EXECUTABLE_NAME)

Partner-FastshipHu
APPL
$(FLUTTER_BUILD_NAME)
Editor
$(FLUTTER_BUILD_NUMBER)
This app requires access to Apple Music to play audio content and manage your music library for a better user experience.
This app needs access to your calendar to schedule and manage delivery events, appointments, and important dates.
This app requires full access to your calendar to create, modify, and manage delivery schedules and important events.
This app needs camera access to scan documents, capture delivery proof photos, and verify package conditions.
This app requires access to your contacts to help you quickly select delivery recipients and manage customer information.
This app uses Face ID to securely authenticate your identity and protect your account information.

This app requires location access to track your position for real-time delivery updates, optimize delivery routes, and notify you of nearby orders. Location is used both when the app is active and in the background.
This app needs continuous location access to provide real-time delivery tracking, route optimization, and background order notifications even when the app is not active.
This app requires location access while in use to track deliveries, optimize routes, and notify you of nearby orders in real-time.
This app needs microphone access to record voice notes for delivery instructions and communicate with customers through voice messages.
This app requires access to save photos to your library for delivery proof, package documentation, and customer communication.
This app needs access to your photo library to upload delivery proof images, package photos, and customer-related documentation.
This app requires speech recognition access to convert voice commands into text for hands-free operation and voice-based navigation.
This app needs access to the device's motion sensors to detect shake gestures for quick actions and emergency features.
The app needs permission to send notifications so you don't miss new orders and important updates.
LaunchScreen
Main
